00049 //
00050 // TwoStageTermScoreFunction.hpp
00051 //
00052 // 16 April 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_TWOSTAGETERMSCOREFUNCTION_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_TWOSTAGETERMSCOREFUNCTION_HPP
00057 
00058 class TwoStageTermScoreFunction : public TermScoreFunction {
00059 private:
00060   double _mu;
00061   double _lambda;
00062   double _collectionFrequency;
00063 
00064 public:
00065   TwoStageTermScoreFunction( double mu, double lambda, double collectionFrequency ) :
00066     _mu(mu),
00067     _lambda(lambda),
00068     _collectionFrequency(collectionFrequency) {
00069   }
00070 
00071   double scoreOccurrence( int occurrences, int contextSize ) {
00072 
00073     //                    [  c(w;d) + \mu * p(w|C)   ]
00074     //    ( 1 - \lambda ) [ ------------------------ ] + \lambda * p(w|C)
00075     //                    [       |d| + \mu          ]
00076 
00077     double dirichlet = ((double(occurrences) + _mu*_collectionFrequency) / (double(contextSize) + _mu));
00078     double p = ( 1-_lambda ) * dirichlet + _lambda * _collectionFrequency;
00079     return log(p);
00080   }
00081 
00082   double scoreOccurrence( int occurrences, int contextSize, int documentOccurrences, int documentLength ) {
00083     double documentFrequency = double(documentOccurrences) / double(documentLength);
00084     double dirichlet = ((double(occurrences) + _mu*documentFrequency) / (double(contextSize) + _mu));
00085     double p = ( 1-_lambda ) * dirichlet + _lambda * _collectionFrequency;
00086     return log(p);
00087   }
00088 };
00089 
00090 #endif // INDRI_TWOSTAGETERMSCOREFUNCTION_HPP
